CustomField.description: Automatically calculates the date when the insurance policy coverage ends based on the start date and contract term.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Insurance_Start_Date__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(Insurance_Term_months__c)) ), ADDMONTHS(Insurance_Start_Date__c, Insurance_Term_months__c), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This date is derived from the Insurance Start Date and Contract Term (Months). It represents the final day the insurance policy remains valid.
CustomField.label: Insurance End Date
